Created an attachment (id=33390)
XML design file
This is a known issue. Those error messages are harmless, you can ignore them.

Like Bugzilla Bug 125431, can u please remove this warning? 

After removing the warning message, please reassign this bug to DTE team.
Model have removed the output EXTENSION_POINT_NOT_FOUND warning. The remaining warning are in JavaScirpt evaluation. Reassign to Engine team.

--Script engine error: TypeError: Cannot read property "CMBP.jpg" from undefined  Script source: null, line: 0, text:

The cause is that your using the embedded image method is wrong.
You can try
    this.imageName="CMBP.jpg"
instead of
    report.design.images["CMBP.jpg"]
